subject: Update Vam pro Not Work
description_text: Hi, I installed the new Simsonn Manager 2.0.9 and the latest firmware for Simson Plus X. Now Vam Pro no longer works. It doesn't work with SimHub or Simsonn Manager.

conversations.body_text: Hi Ivan Foggia,     Please replug the USB and check if CPU2 shows version 2.0.0. If it doesn’t, please manually update the PlusX firmware again using the steps below:    Open SIMSONN Manager and go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update.    Select the Pedals-firmware-pedals- plusx.sfu file to perform the update.    After updating, check again if CPU2 shows version 2.0.0.
Hi Ivan Foggia,  Please disconnect both the USB and DC power. Then, plug in the USB first and check if CPU2 shows version 2.0.0. If it does, you can then connect the DC power.

Ok, thanks, I solved it by unplugging the power supply.

Foggia Ivan

________________________________
Da: service@simsonn.com
